title: Sans serif. Helvetica family but different!
author: rggt partners

comments.content: It must be **[Open Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125638/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Open%20Sans%20-%20Regular&fid=629a55a7e793da068dc580d184cc0e31&fsize=36&text=ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ%20abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz%200123456789&wrap=2)** designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp (the font is included in Google Web Fonts)
yeeeeeesssssss!! You saved my life: Thanks a lot!
